name: Pique de Azteca
description: Pique de Azteca is a tribute to the rich agricultural history of Mexico, featuring the Xcatic pepper, a rare gem found in the Yucat√°n Peninsula. Known for its unique flavor profile that combines citrus undertones with a floral sweetness, the Xcatic pepper brings an exquisite complexity to this sauce.
